name: Magic Chess (itch) (Jorge Puertovannetti)
description:
Magical Checkmate!

Magic Chess is a couch two-player game, each player decides which color they will be and control the game with one mouse.

=====================================================
Instructions
Tip: The starting color will always be white!

Piece List
